original_title: Disney's Sing-Along Songs: 101 Notes of Fun
overview: International version of the 1989 release 'Disney's Sing Along Songs Fun With Music'  Narrated and hosted by Professor Ludwig Von Drake, this video includes sing-along cuts from several Disney movies, including Alice in Wonderland and Snow White, plus Billy Joel singing "Why Should I Worry."
title: Disney's Sing-Along Songs: 101 Notes of Fun
